item.title: Staying informed
item.description: Authors Gr√©goire MOLVEAU What should I read ? Who should I follow ? NetSec subreddit website rss json MISC magazine buy Hacker News YCombinator (IT news) website rss Daniel MIESSLER blog newsletter old newsletters TheHackerNews website + newsletter rss Krebs On Security blog rss OSS-Security rss mailing-list Troy Hunt blog rss Security Affairs blog Kitploit (pentest tools) website + newsletter rss CERT ANSSI (CVE) rss Twitter Troy HUNT - @troyhunt @whitequark Jek HYDE - @HydeNS33k Chris EVANS - @scarybeasts @hasherezade @x0rz Binni SHAH - @binitamshah Rob FULLER - @mubix @0xmitsurugi Tavis Ormandy - @taviso quick trick with gmail: if you have a gmail adress, you can use aliases to sort your mails.
